reviews.review: Great game, if your looking for a hard puzzle game to test your knowledge on physics and timing.
I'M GONNA BURN YOUR HOUSE DOWN, WITH THE LEMONS!

Pues... Que te puedo decir acerca de este juego que aun no se ha dicho, "Superior a Portal 1", "El mejor juego de puzzle de Valve", "jaja GLaDOS patata", "PotatOS", y todo eso, la verdad es que esta de puta madre, incluso siendo el "final", ya que ronda a mas de 10.000 años al futuro, como en la primera entrega, compratelo, no te vas a arrepentir. (Eso si, sigue siendo cortisimo compaado a otros juegos.)

best decision ever

Masterful puzzles, chilling and emotional storytelling, hilarious voice acting. Portal 2 is a must play for anyone with a love of puzzle games. The fact that this game is a sequel is not a hindrance to new players as the game can be played without knowing the story of Portal (I played Portal 2 first and still love it). Ellen McLain and Stephen Merchant (He should do more voice acting because he's amazing) both play their respective robots brilliantly. For a puzzle video game to have one of the best credits ever (just wait and see) is kind of amazing. I love the community levels too. Seeing other people's puzzles makes the game seem more multiplayer to me (I have no friends that play portal to play coop with, the freaks) and even though I can't solve most of them, it keeps the game refreshing. I really, really, really (really) want a Portal 3, but until then, Portal Reloaded (a fan made mod) will do. VALVE! Learn to count to 3 please!

An absolute Masterpiece that IMO surpasses the first Portal. Excellent tight puzzle gameplay. A wonderful properly paced story with memorable moments and charming murderous characters. There is a separate distinct Co-op campaign so you can enjoy more of this goodness with a friend. Extensive Steam workshop support ensures near infinite content and replay-ability, either solo or often with a friend.

A must-play and must-have for any gamer.

Игра просто бомба очень рекомендую пройти ее, если вы не играли. Проходил одиночку и кооператив до конца с другом особенно смешно забирать мосты из-под его ног, менять его порталы на мои и отправлять куда-то, заслонять собой проходы чтобы он падал, шмалять лазером через куб и так далее. В одиночке очень классные диалоги, головоломки ну и более атмосферно канешно чем онлайн здесь то понятно. Неожиданные повороты и сюжет не предвидишь (если ты его не знал с самого начала). Жду 3 часть ахаахаха ^-^.
